title: Strictly Come Dancing: week one – live
summary: In a lively dance competition, Karen Carney impressed judges and topped the scoreboard on her first performance. Late substitute Amber Davies also garnered attention with her impressive routine. Conversely, Ross King found himself at the bottom of the standings.

title: Tottenham 1-1 Wolves: Premier League – as it happened
summary: Wolves appeared set for victory until Joao Palhinha scored a stunning equalizer for Tottenham Hotspur. The goal came just seconds before the final whistle, denying Wolves a deserved win. This dramatic turn of events showcased Palhinha's talent and kept Spurs in the game.

title: Ryder Cup: USA 3½-8½ Europe – visitors extend lead after foursomes
summary: On day two at Bethpage Black, Europe aims to extend their lead in the competition. Live updates provide hole-by-hole coverage of the event. Stay tuned for the latest developments from our team of writers.

title: Nine Bodies in a Mexican Morgue review – nothing has given me greater joy this year
summary: This new crime drama from Anthony Horowitz blends Agatha Christie-inspired mysteries with surreal twists akin to "Lost." It's an entertainingly over-the-top experience that revels in its absurdity. Viewers are encouraged to embrace the show's delightful absurdness.

title: Premier League top scorers 2025-26: who is leading race for golden boot?
summary: The latest news highlights the top goal scorers in the English Premier League for the current season. Key players are standing out for their impressive performances and contributions to their teams. Fans are eager to see how the race for the golden boot unfolds as the season progresses.
